outputs.file_open_err:
Error opening config file. File may be missing or may be empty.
Loading default config. You must specify SCREENSHOT WINDOW in Config Tab
outputs.window_id_err: Wrong window attribute. Check Config Tab

gui.desc_what_step:
[s - seconds] Number ℕ > 0 which specifies every how many seconds the program should check if
slide changed.
Recommended value: 5/10 [s]
gui.desc_what_path: Path to the folder where screenshots will be saved
gui.desc_what_diff_perc:
Number ℝ > 0 which specifies how much should the slides differ from each other
so that the program will count the next slide as a new one.
Recommended value: ≈ 2.0
[The value should be chosen according to the presentation.
The more the slides differ from each other, the greater the value should be]
Not recommended setting > 5.0
gui.desc_what_coords:
Allows You to crop screenshot area of e.g. presentation area only, of the window. 
How to set it? After clicking the button that sets the coordinates, place the mouse in the upper left corner
of the window section and click F1, then place the mouse in the lower right corner of the area and click F2.
Info: The F1 position must be above the F2 position
gui.author: Author
